document.full_text: mets relievers blew a late-inning lead to the phillies for the second night in a row, this time erasing a fine outing by starter mike pelfrey.
document.title: phillies 5, mets 2 : as potential investor watches, bullpen displays little security
lines_and_colors: mets relievers blew a late-inning lead to the phillies for the second night in a row, this time erasing a fine outing by starter mike pelfrey.
